key_channel_insights.line_content: OTA fares sustained over 95% price parity with a mild setback from the previous week, indicating mostly stable alignment.
Over half of MSE fares were cheaper than the airline’s site, with parity holding near 47% and minimal fares listed higher.
More than 88% of GDS fares matched the website, with low missing content and rare undercuts demonstrating solid consistency.

conclusion.line_content: This report provides a high-level summary of the price discrepancies observed across different channels.  It is important to note that the data contains many nuances depending on various factors such as market conditions, booking windows, and the competitive landscape. Understanding these subtleties can be critical in optimizing pricing strategies and ensuring competitive positioning.

As part of our 'PriceEye' solution, we are developing an intuitive dashboard designed to help your airline's analysts drill down into this data. This tool will allow you to uncover and focus on critical actionable insights, enabling your team to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

We are here to support you in leveraging these insights to enhance your revenue management and distribution strategies. Please don't hesitate to connect with our team for more information about how PriceEye can assist you in achieving your business objectives.

ota_highlights.line_content: Over 95% of last-week OTA fares matched the airline’s site, reflecting strong price alignment.
‘OTA N/A’ increased from 0.4% to 2.6%, indicating a modest rise in unlisted fares.
‘OTA Lower’ remains under 1%, with a slight jump on short-haul flights.

ota_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: ‘OTA N/A’ climbed from 0.4% to 2.6%, highlighting additional missing fares.
Price parity reached 95.3% last week, a slight decline from 97.2%.
‘OTA Higher’ fell from 2.3% to 1.8%, while ‘OTA Lower’ remained under 0.5%.

ota_summary_by_region.line_content: ‘OTA N/A’ rose to 2.7% from 0.4%, with about 95% maintaining the same price.
No ‘OTA Lower’ fares and roughly 96% matching airline prices.

ota_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: ‘OTA N/A’ hit 2.72%, and ‘OTA Lower’ stayed below 0.3%.
No ‘OTA Lower’, while ‘OTA Higher’ hovered near 2.3%.

ota_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: ‘OTA N/A’ rose from 0.4% to 3.8%, though most fares remained in parity.
99.2% parity, minimal ‘OTA Higher’ listings, and almost no missing offers.

mse_highlights.line_content: Over half of MSE fares were cheaper last week, especially on long-haul and non-MX routes.
Close to half of fares matched the airline’s site, showing minor shifts over time.
Close-in bookings favored MSE by 63%, while far-out bookings saw about 30% cheaper fares.

mse_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Nearly 47% last week, slightly up from the previous week.
MSE Lower exceeds half, while MSE Higher remains under 1%.

mse_summary_by_region.line_content: MSE offered cheaper fares in nearly 50% of cases, consistently over recent months.
MSE undercut fares in over 92% of the cases, peaking at 96% previously.

mse_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: MSE cheaper in ~47% of fares last week, trending to 50% month over month.
MSE had lower fares about 98% of the time, remaining consistently high historically.

mse_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: MSE cheaper 63% last week, maintaining an upward trend.
MSE cheaper 30% last week and improving to 35% month over month.

gds_highlights.line_content: Over 88% of GDS fares match the airline’s site, showing stability week to week.
GDS N/A rarely exceeds 0.6%, even on long-haul routes.
Channel-lower is under 2%, with a slight average discount near -0.2%.

gds_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Remains under 1%, continuing a slight decline from previous months.
Fares in parity hover between 75–90% across segments.
Higher rates range from 8–20%, while lower fares remain below 2% overall.

gds_summary_by_region.line_content: About 89% parity, ~9% GDS higher, and under 2% channel-lower.
Parity near 76%, about 19% GDS higher, with single-digit GDS N/A.

gds_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: ~90% fare alignment, ~9% GDS higher, and below 2% lower.
~78% parity, ~20% GDS higher, and minimal GDS lower below 2%.

gds_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: ~88% parity, ~10% GDS higher, and ~2% GDS lower.
~90% parity, ~9% GDS higher, and <1% GDS lower.
